title: unaku samanamay
sahitya:
unakku samAnamAi oruvarai shollavO oppuyarvillA appanE paramporuLE



anupallavi



enakku samAnamA enru mAr taTTiya eNNAyiram kOTi pEr

maNNAgak-kaNDuviTTOm



caraNam



nIyanri ulaguNDO nIrinri mInuNDO nIla vAn shuDarinri nILuyirulaguNDO

TAyum tandaiyumAga dayavuDan eppOdun-tAngi engaLai viTTu nIngAda

kaDavuLE
